page.title: 14Amenities in Codnor 1
page.content: Codnor has many amenities for its size.There are two{recreation grounds, a football pitch and a common where anyone can walk, play games or play on the swings.There are football clubs for adults and boys and a cricket club. There are{Brownie,Cub,Scout and {Guide groups}which are very popular. These groups encourage children to help others ,teach them about outdoor things and first aid, and take many of them camping in the summer. The{Miners Welfare}caters for many activities:disco dancing, dancing classes,keep fit,pool,darts and snooker matches. The{Sheehy Hall}is the old age pensioners' meeting hall and a Karate club is held there. There is an 18 hole{golf course}with club house and resaurant at Ormonde Fields. { DC/NA/CL/LS/LP/CR/IDS
